title: The Resilient Sea Turtle
description: Sea turtles are ancient marine reptiles known for their large, teardrop-shaped shells and flippers. They migrate long distances and are found in all of the world's oceans except for the polar regions.

questions.question: What is a major threat to sea turtles' survival?
What is the primary diet of a Green Sea Turtle?
Which of these is a unique characteristic of a sea turtle's life?
options: They return to the exact beach where they were born to lay their eggs
They lay their eggs in a nest on a tree
They change their gender as they age
questions.correct_answer: They return to the exact beach where they were born to lay their eggs

questions.question: How long can a sea turtle live?
What is the collective noun for a group of sea turtles?
